overview: 4AD Video Compilation. All tracks written or recorded exclusively for this compilation, except "Frontier" by Dead Can Dance. Although uncredited, the end titles soundtrack is the instrumental version of 'Oomingmak' by Cocteau Twins, which can be found on the bonus CD included to Cocteau Twins Singles Collection.  This video was released in both PAL (this one) and NTSC (US) format with the same catalogue number.  1 	–Dead Can Dance 	Frontier	2:58  2 	–Cocteau Twins 	Crushed	3:16  3 	–This Mortal Coil 	Acid, Bitter And Sad	5:26  4 	–Throwing Muses 	Fish	4:28  5 	–Clan Of Xymox 	Muscoviet Mosquito	4:03  6 	–The Wolfgang Press 	Cut The Tree	5:35  7 	–Colourbox 	Hot Doggie	2:57  8 	–Dif Juz 	No Motion	4:49  9 	–Dead Can Dance 	The Protagonist	8:47
title: Lonely Is an Eyesore
